sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-row>
    	<v-overlay :value="overlay">
        <v-progress-circular
            indeterminate
            size="64"
        ></v-progress-circular>
        </v-overlay>
        <v-col cols="12">
            <DataTable :headers="headers" :desserts="desserts" :loading="loadTable" @customChange="openModal"  :title="title" @edit="editData" @delete="showModalDelete" />
        </v-col>
        <v-dialog v-model="dialog" width="1000">
            <v-card>
                <v-card-title class="text-h5 grey lighten-2">
                    {{ tituloModal }}
                </v-card-title>
                <v-card-text>
                    <ModalContacto 
                    @closeDialog="close" 
                    :clientes="clientes" 
                    v-on:updateData="handleData" 
                    :editData="dataEditForm"/>
                </v-card-text>
                <v-divider></v-divider>
            </v-card>
        </v-dialog>
        <v-dialog v-model="dialogDelete" max-width="350">
            <v-card>
                <v-card-title class="text-h5">
                    Eliminar Registro
                </v-card-title>

                <v-card-text>
                    Estas seguro de eliminar el Registro?
                </v-card-text>

                <v-card-actions>
                    <v-spacer></v-spacer>

                    <v-btn
                        color="red darken-1"
                        text
                        @click="dialogDelete = false"
                    >
                        Cancelar
                    </v-btn>
                    <v-btn
                        color="green darken-1"
                        text
                        @click="deleteContact()"
                    >
                        Aceptar
                    </v-btn>
                </v-card-actions>
            </v-card>
        </v-dialog>
    </v-row>
</template>

<script lang="ts">
import { Vue, Component, Prop } from 'vue-property-decorator';
import contactModule from '@/store/modules/contactModule';
import clientModule from '@/store/modules/clientModule';
import ModalContacto from './ModalContacto.vue'
import {serialize, deserialize } from 'jsonapi-fractal'

@Component({
  components: {
    ModalContacto
  }
})
export default class Contacto extends Vue {
	@Prop() item?: Object;
     headers = [
            {text: 'Nombre Completo', value: 'nombre_completo'},
            {text: 'Cargo', value: 'cargo'},
            {text: 'Email', value: 'email'},
            {text: 'Telefono', value: 'telefono'},
            {text: 'Celular', value: 'celular'},
            {text: 'Action', value: 'action'}
            ];
    overlay = false;
    desserts : any = [];
    search   : String = '';
    selected : Object = [];
    loadTable  : boolean = true ;
    clientes : any = [];
    dialog : boolean = false;
    dialogDelete : boolean = false;
    title  : string = 'NEW CONTACT'
    tituloModal : string = ''
    dataEditForm : object = {}
    dataDeleteForm  = {
        id : '',
        deletedAt : ''
    }
   

    get FormRequestDelete(): any {
        return serialize(this.dataDeleteForm,'contactos',{});
    }
    openModal(){
        this.tituloModal = 'Crear Contacto'
        this.dialog = true
    }
    editData(item){
        this.dataEditForm = item
        this.tituloModal = 'Actualizar Contacto'
        this.dialog = true
    }
    showModalDelete(id){
        this.dialogDelete = true;
        this.dataDeleteForm.id = id
        this.dataDeleteForm.deletedAt = this.currentDate()
    }
    async deleteContact(){
        this.overlay = true
        const res = await contactModule.deleteContacto(this.FormRequestDelete);
        this.desserts = res;
        this.dialogDelete = false;
        this.overlay = false
    }
    close(event){
        this.dialog = false
    }
    handleData(event){
        this.desserts = event;
    }
    currentDate() {
        var date = new Date();
        return  date.toISOString();
    }

    async getContactos() {
        const res = await  contactModule.getContactosAll();
        this.desserts = res;
        this.loadTable = false;
    }

    async getClientesAll(){
        const cliente = await  contactModule.getClientes();
        this.clientes = cliente;
        console.log(this.clientes)
    }

    mounted(){
        this.getContactos();
        this.getClientesAll();
    }

}
</script>
<style lang="scss" scoped>
::v-deep .table-one {
    thead.v-data-table-header {
        tr {
            &:hover {
                background-color: #f2f3f8;
            }
            th {
                span {
                    font-size: 16px;
                    color: #304156;
                }
            }
        }
        tr {
            td {
                padding-bottom: 20px;
                padding-top: 20px;
            }
        }
    }
    tbody {
        tr {
            &:hover {
                background-color: #f2f3f8 !important;
            }
        }
    }
}
</style>
